details.description:
To watch a more in depth version of this pitch presentation, please follow this link.
You can watch 60 second pitches from other ODI startups on our Vimeo channel.

OpenCorporates is the largest openly licensed database of companies in the world, with over 49 million companies in over 60 jurisdictions. By providing a single database of companies that can be searched without fee, and without restriction, it is radically changing the ability of journalists, NGOs, small companies, and even governments to understand and combine their company-related data.

Despite being less than 2 years old, OpenCorporates is already working with national governments and intergovernmental bodies to increase the transparency and understanding of company data, including the World Bank and the Financial Stability Board.  Case Study
